author: 0xevan
content: there probably needs to be a new channel for 4844 data challenge specifically...since there isn't, I don't see why this wouldn't be a good channel to talk about it

author: 0xevan
content:
```Also I assume it'd be a generally bad idea for someone to change the price bump value on their local node, in that since all the ELs I checked at least default to a 100% price bump lowering the value in my local node would just result in my replacement tx never getting propagated to blobk builders, right?
```

I don't think it would never get propagated to the block builders. It's more that you risk having the tx sitting there with an ineffective new price that you have to update yet again.

It's better to update a single time with a 100% price bump than to update twice with two 50% price bumps
